argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcsect.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcsect.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 3 |  | oppcsect.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | oppcsect.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | oppcsect.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | oppciso.s | |- I = ( Iso ` C ) |
| 7 |  | oppciso.t | |- J = ( Iso ` O ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` C ) = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Inv ` O ) = ( Inv ` O ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8, 9 | #P_oppcinv | |- ( ph -> ( X ( Inv ` O ) Y ) = ( Y ( Inv ` C ) X ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ph -> dom ( X ( Inv ` O ) Y ) = dom ( Y ( Inv ` C ) X ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 1 | #P_oppcbas | |- B = ( Base ` O ) |
| 13 | 2 | #P_oppccat | |- ( C e. Cat -> O e. Cat ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> O e. Cat ) |
| 15 | 12, 9, 14, 4, 5, 7 | #P_isoval | |- ( ph -> ( X J Y ) = dom ( X ( Inv ` O ) Y ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 8, 3, 5, 4, 6 | #P_isoval | |- ( ph -> ( Y I X ) = dom ( Y ( Inv ` C ) X ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 15, 16 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( X J Y ) = ( Y I X ) ) |
